title: Gilani mourns tragic death of mountaineer Murad Sadpara
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 12 (APP): Chairman Senate Syed Yusuf Raza Gilani on Monday expressed profound sorrow and grief over the tragic death of renowned mountaineer Muhammad Murad Sadpara.
In his condolence message, the Chairman acknowledged the significant contributions of Muhammad Murad Sadpara to the field of mountaineering, said, “We deeply mourn the loss of a national hero who brought immense pride to Pakistan on the world stage.”
Gilani extended his heartfelt condolences to the family of Muhammad Murad Sadpara, offering prayers for the elevation of the late mountaineer’s soul and for patience and strength for his loved ones to endure this immense loss.
